activities: Igenti is a software developer and application service provider. Users of our applications include our clients and their customers, members, candidates, etc. (i.e. client contacts). Clients and client contacts typically upload or enter their own data into our applications and we function as the service provider to maintain the application and process the data and communications supported by the applications. Interactions with regard to data entered by clients or client contacts are between those parties and not with Igenti. We do not control or own the data uploaded or entered by clients or client contacts. The data received and maintained in our applications includes personal contact information, resume and other employment application information from job candidates, employees, and other individuals.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
